creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
description: pendant has two main sections: upper section has a bird motif with 2 small pendant strings attached; each string has 2 cone shapes and a ball attached to an open flower-like shape; lower section: larger; has a floral motif with 7 pendant strings; string motifs are 4 cones, 2 balls and a central flower; no neck chain
title: Pendant
